flavorText:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

foreignData.flavorText: „Metzelt die Bestien nieder, auf denen sie reiten, und ihre Stärke wird vergehen." —Vona, Schlächterin von Magan
foreignData.name: Die Starken metzeln
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler bestimmt eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen, die er kontrolliert und die zusammen Stärke 4 oder weniger haben, und opfert dann alle anderen Kreaturen, die er kontrolliert.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quítales las bestias en las que montan y su fuerza se queda en nada". —Vona de Yedo, la Asesina de Magán
foreignData.name: Sacrificar a los fuertes
foreignData.text: Cada jugador elige cualquier cantidad de criaturas que controla con fuerza total de 4 o menos. Luego, sacrifica todas las otras criaturas que controla.

foreignData.flavorText: « Massacrez leurs montures et leur force disparaît. » —Vona de Iedo, bouchère de Magan
foreignData.name: Massacrer les forts
foreignData.text: Chaque joueur choisit n'importe quel nombre de créatures avec une force totale inférieure ou égale à 4 qu'il contrôle, puis sacrifie toutes les autres créatures qu'il contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se privati delle bestie che cavalcano, la loro forza è nulla." —Vona di Iedo, macellaia di Magan
foreignData.name: Massacrare i Forti
foreignData.text: Ogni giocatore sceglie un qualsiasi numero di creature che controlla con forza totale pari o inferiore a 4, poi sacrifica tutte le altre creature che controlla.

foreignData.flavorText: 「獣どもの意表を突いて始末する。奴らの強さなど何物でもない。」 ――マガーンの鏖殺者、イエードのヴォーナ
foreignData.name: 強者鏖殺
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分がコントロールしている望む数のクリーチャーを、それらのパワーの合計が４以下になるように選び、その後自分がコントロールしている他のクリーチャーをすべて生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.flavorText: "야수들을 배 아래에서 베어내면 그것들의 힘은 아무 것도 아니야." —마간의 도살자, 이에도의 보나
foreignData.name: 강자 학살
foreignData.text: 각 플레이어는 자신이 조종하는 생물들을 공격력의 총합이 4 이하가 되도록 원하는 만큼 선택한 다음, 자신이 조종하는 다른 모든 생물을 희생한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sem as feras que montam sua força é nula." — Vona de Iedo, açougueira de Magan
foreignData.name: Matar os Fortes
foreignData.text: Cada jogador escolhe qualquer número de criaturas que ele controle com total de poder igual ou inferior a 4 e, em seguida, sacrifica todas as outras criaturas que ele controla.

foreignData.flavorText: «Убить тварей под ними — и их силы как не бывало». — Вона из Йедо, Маганская Живодерка
foreignData.name: Истребление Сильных
foreignData.text: Каждый игрок выбирает любое количество существ под своим контролем с суммарной силой 4 или менее, затем жертвует все остальные существа под своим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 「从下方攻击这些野兽，它们的力量便不足为惧。」 ～玛甘屠夫，伊埃多的沃娜
foreignData.name: 斩杀猛兽
foreignData.text: 每位牌手各选择任意数量由其操控的生物且力量总和等于或小于4的生物，然后牺牲所有由其操控的其他生物。

foreignData.flavorText: 「從下方攻擊這些野獸，牠們的力量便不足為懼。」 ～瑪甘屠夫，伊埃多的沃娜
foreignData.name: 斬殺猛獸
foreignData.text: 每位玩家各選擇任意數量由其操控且力量總和等於或小於4的生物，然後犧牲所有由其操控的其他生物。

name: Slaughter the Strong
originalText: Each player chooses any number of creatures he or she controls with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures he or she controls.

rulings.text: Slaughter the Strong has each player choose any number of creatures and then checks that the total power of creatures each player chose this way is 4 or less. For example, you could save two 2/2 creatures, or a 1/1 and a 3/3 creature, but not all four of those creatures.

As Slaughter the Strong resolves, first the player whose turn it is chooses which creatures will be spared, then each other player in turn order does the same knowing the choices made before them. Then all the creatures not chosen are sacrificed simultaneously.
If a creature's power is somehow less than 0, it subtracts from the total power of the other creatures its controller chooses. This can cause creatures with power 5 or greater to survive.

text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
